data: Midnight was striking, and all Paris was astir; the streets were filled with people bent on merrymaking; it was the eve of Mardi Gras (Shrove Tuesday).
Midnight was striking, and all Paris was astir; the streets were filled with people bent on merrymaking; it was the eve of _Mardi Gras_ (Shrove Tuesday).
Love in a Mask; Or, Imprudence and Happiness
Balzac, Honoré de, 1799-1850; Ivimy, Alice M. [Translator]
